item.title: The Mathematical History of Economics
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Reading notes on the book “Mathematics and Economics” by Shi Shuzhong, which introduces the development of mathematical tools in economics.

item.title: The Rhetoric of Economics
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The Rhetoric of Economics discusses the literary aspects of economic works and even mathematical models from the perspective of literary criticism, offering a very unique viewpoint.

item.title: 《Crossing Boundaries of Community》: Fluid Relations and the Origins of Communities
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Xiang Biao’s 《Crossing Boundaries of Community》 is straightforward and humorous, exploring his research methodology and focusing on new community development models.

item.title: Pursuing Scholarship: Beyond 'Serving the World' and 'Because the Mountain Is There'
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: This article explores the essence of academic pursuit through Wang Xiaobo’s works and the spirit of science, emphasizing that the drive for answers stems from curiosity and desire for knowledge, rather than pursuing utility or practicality.

item.title: Goodbye, Eri: Not Remembering Others, but Knowing Oneself
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Behind every act of madness lies a resilient and pure heart. The key to understanding ‘Goodbye, Eri’ is not about remembering others but realizing Yuta was filming himself all along. Words fail to convey how much effort I’ve poured into loving this world.
